ChatGPT is as good as your input.

This free tool fixes your bad prompts:

☑ Go to https://lnkd.in/ePWMRiKn.
☑ Type "a prompt to" + add what you need.
☑ The Prompt Maker will write a better prompt.

Here, I shared the bad prompt "a prompt to copy my writing style, and I can add my writing snippets in [brackets] for you to be trained on it".

The result is a massive prompt to copy & paste on a new chat: https://lnkd.in/dGTavMDy.

I wrote a free guide on how to prompt ChatGPT.
